name: Ask It
author: Evan Weible

sections.description:
Ask It enables wordpress users to ask administrators questions and have them answered via the dashboard. Three dashboard widgets are added:

  1. Question Form
  2. My Questions
  3. Answered Questions

Other features include:

  • Options to remove any or all of the default dashboard widgets
  • Email & Text alerts when questions are asked, and email alerts when questions are answered
sections.installation:
1. Upload /ask-it/ to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Fixes a missing default setting.

1.0.1

  • Fixes broken links to ask-it.js and ask-it.css

1.0

  • Initial release.

upgrade_notice.1.0.2: • If you are running version 1.0, please upgrade as the JavaScript and CSS includes were broken and a default setting was missing.
upgrade_notice.1.0.1: • Links to JavaScript and CSS files were broken, please upgrade.
